column4: in my sudoers file there is entry: www-data ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /sbin/iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp|udp but it doesn't work, when i try to add this rule with -p tcp it prompts me for password
how can i use regexp to do this?
[tcp|udp]* works but it isn't exaclty what i want
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
